summary:
Twitch is a popular website where people can watch live video game streams, music, and creative content. It started in 2011 as part of Justin.tv but quickly became more successful, attracting 45 million viewers by 2013. In 2014, Amazon bought Twitch, and it grew even more, reaching over 100 million monthly viewers.

Twitch is the top platform for gaming live streams in the US, with many active users and broadcasters. It offers a wide range of games and has partnerships with thousands of content creators. However, in 2024, Twitch will stop operating in South Korea due to high network fees.
title: Twitch (service)
